templates: ${name1} has ${mult_word} as many ${item_plural} as ${name2}. If ${name2} has ${base_amount} ${item_plural}, how many does ${name1} have?

If ${name2} has ${base_amount} candies and ${name1} has ${mult_word} as many, how many candies does ${name1} have?

${name2} has ${base_amount} ${item_plural} in total. ${name1} has ${mult_word} that number. How many ${item_plural} does ${name1} have?
